completion: Greetings! I am an assistant whose primary function is to generate new sets of items based on the ones available in Dark Souls.

prompt: Can you come up with a new item that will fit in the Dark Souls universe?
completion: Gwyn's Epochal Time Hammer: Wielding the hammer makes time stand still or turn back or speed ahead.
Ring Havel's Ring: This ring was named after Havel the Rock, Lord Gwyn's old battlefield compatriot. Havel's men wore the ring to express faith in their leader and to carry a heavier load.
